text: Joyce Jameson (September 26, 1932 â€“ January 16, 1987) was an American actress. She played sexualized roles at the same time Marilyn Monroe was famous. She played a fun girl named Skippy in the 1960s television program The Andy Griffith Show. She played "The Blonde" in the 1960 Academy Award winning movie The Apartment. She also played small parts in other movies and was not listed as a cast member. Jameson was born in Chicago, Illinois. She committed suicide by overdosing on pills at age 54 in Burbank, California. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors who committed suicide Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Drug-related suicides in the United States Category:Suicides in California
title: Joyce Jameson
